conbody.p:
After purchasing a taxable item:
Sales Order Line(s) are created.
Individual Sales Order Line(s) created for the Sales Tax or VAT.

image.alt: Tax Rates applied to a Sales Order

conbody.p:
Closing and posting the Sales Order journals:
A debit to the Cash account for the total amount on the sales order.
A credit to the Revenue account for the sale price of the item.
A credit to the Tax Liabilities GL account for the amount of the Sales Tax or VAT.

note.b: When multiple items are purchased with different tax classes, the sales order reflects all the taxes that apply.
